attributes.action: Hold a general election for a government to keep us in or take us out of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
We have not elected a government to lead us through these extremely challenging times. We must. If we are to leave the EU we must elect a government with a mandate and a plan to negotiate our exit from the EU and reenact the legislation and renegotiate the trade deals upon which we've relied for the past 43 years.

Or we can vote for a government to keep us in the EU, keep the UK together and heal the rifts we've created in our society and with our trading partners around the world.
attributes.background: This is the single most important issue of our generation and the next few. The very future of the UK, our democracy and prosperity depends upon it.
